channel.title: Can we give the inq the much needed "lose this ability of you kill a non-heretic" line?
channel.description: Just to prevents inq from attacking randoms n1-3 and than somewhat afking

item.title: Can we give the inq the much needed "lose this ability of you kill a non-heretic" line?
item.dc:creator: thepigeonnyc
item.description:
I haven’t seen this as a big problem, but it does seem unfair to be yoloed by an inq when you’re not heretic. I think it should consume the ability charge, but not attack the target (similar to how
attacking magic users originally worked). I think losing the ability is excessive though.

Read full topic
item.source: Can we give the inq the much needed "lose this ability of you kill a non-heretic" line?
